    • Constructor Detail

      • Plane

        public Plane​(int posX,
             int posY,
             int objWidth,
             int objHeight,
             int defaultHSpeed,
             int defaultVSpeed,
             int health,
             java.lang.String name,
             int FIRECOOLDOWN,
             int ALTFIRECOOLDOWN,
             int defaultProjectileHeight,
             int defaultProjectileWidth)
        Parameters:
        posX - - the X position of the top left of the square
        posY - - the Y position of the top left of the square
        objWidth - - the width
        objHeight - height
        defaultHSpeed - the H value that is referenced as how fast it can/ should be going
        defaultVSpeed - the V value that is referenced as how fast it can/ should be going
        health - the health of the player
        name - the name of the player
        FIRECOOLDOWN - The default value reference to stop the player from spamming the fire button
        ALTFIRECOOLDOWN - the default value reference to stop the player from spamming the alt fire button
        defaultProjectileHeight - the reference height for when the plane fires a projectile
        defaultProjectileWidth - the reference width of a fired projectile
